::Savanna::

She spoke through her link.  "You two bots over there. I am Savanna.  
I replied to the distress call of this ship. Identify yourselves."
If they were here to cause harm to the newcomer, she would be ready 
to fight if nessessary.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, firefox_y2k@h... wrote:
> -^Hysteria^-
> 
> Hysteria looks up at Kluster, her eyes narrowed in suspicion:
> 
> "Are ya sure they're allies?"
> 
> Hysteria gazed at Phobia's ship. Not that she had anything against
> the 
> transformer, she just didn't trust 'bots she didn't know, that's 
all.
> 
> >yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Kluster::
> > 
> > Kluster grins, looking down at Hysteria. "We? We're going to meet 
a 
> possible 
> > ally."
> > 
> > Phobia's ship was visible in front of them. Kluster quickens his 
> pace, 
> > activating his comm-link.
> > 
> > "We're aproaching your ship," he says into it, "Me and two bots. 
> Please do 
> > not be allarmed."
